attributes.action: Ensure that a full investigation is carried out into Baroness Uddins 2nd home expenses.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This story is the straw that has broken the camels back. If the papers are correct it is a blatant swindle of taxpayers money at a time when families are struggling to buy the weekly shop.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the House of Lords Authorities.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
